title: 2019 Junior World Luge Championships
text:
The 34th <a href="Junior%20World%20Luge%20Championships">Junior World Luge Championships</a> took place under the auspices of the <a href="International%20Luge%20Federation">International Luge Federation</a> at <a href="Olympic%20Sliding%20Centre%20Innsbruck">Innsbruck</a>, <a href="Austria">Austria</a> from 1 to 2 February 2019.
Schedule.
Four events will be held.
